trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a workflow in design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 모양 및 느낌 속성 설정을 디자인 타임 환경의 워크플로에 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마는 워크플로 디자인 화면의 모양 및 느낌을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 여기에는 워크플로에 정의된 배경 스타일, 전경 스타일, 글꼴 및 아이콘이 포함됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a theme defined for a specific workflow.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class can be used for default properties if a specific workflow theme is not desired.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> 클래스는 특정 워크플로 테마를 원하지 않을 경우 기본 속성에 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> that describes default values for the look and feel of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />의 모양 및 느낌에 대한 기본 값을 설명하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> describes the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>는 워크플로 디자인 화면의 모양 및 느낌을 설명합니다.

trans-unit.source: This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 여기에는 워크플로 디자인 화면에 정의된 배경 스타일, 전경 스타일, 글꼴 및 아이콘이 포함됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `AmbientTheme` property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 `AmbientTheme` 속성에 액세스하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 Tracking Profile Designer SDK 샘플에 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
Creates a duplicate theme.
An object that represents the newly-cloned theme.
Use `Clone` to create a duplicate theme with property settings that match the cloning theme.
trans-unit.target: 복제 테마와 일치하는 속성 설정을 가진 복제 테마를 만들려면 `Clone`을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the directory part of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath" />.
The directory part of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath" />.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ContainingFileDirectory%2A> to get the directory part of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A>.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType" /> of the standard theme to create.
Creates a standard theme.
The newly created <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CreateStandardTheme%2A> to create a new theme available anyone who uses the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Workflow Designer를 사용하는 모든 사용자가 사용할 수 있는 새 테마를 만들려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CreateStandardTheme%2A>을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current theme.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> that is used for display settings.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> to make changes to the theme used to display the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로를 표시하는 데 사용하는 테마를 변경하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> associated with a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> 속성을 사용하여 워크플로와 연결된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>에 액세스하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 파일에 있는 Workflow Monitor SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
Gets or sets the description of the theme.
The description of the theme.
The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마가 읽기 전용이기 때문에 속성 값을 설정할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of designer themes associated with the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로와 연결된 디자이너 테마의 목록을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A list of designer themes associated with the workflow.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.DesignerThemes%2A> to retrieve a list of designer themes that are associated with the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로와 연결된 디자이너 테마의 목록을 검색하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.DesignerThemes%2A>를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable change notification.
trans-unit.target: 변경 알림을 사용하도록 설정할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable change notification; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 변경 알림을 활성화하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Enabling change notification causes the theme changed events to occur when changes to the theme are made.
trans-unit.target: 변경 알림을 활성화하면 테마를 변경할 때 테마 변경 이벤트가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file path for the theme.
The file path for the theme.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A> represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A>는 테마 설정을 저장하는 파일의 경로를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마가 읽기 전용이기 때문에 속성 값을 설정할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows an object to clean up any resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의되는 경우 개체는 모든 리소스를 명확하게 정리할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up resources by calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>(`false`).
Override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> to customize the cleanup.
Generates a file path for the theme.
A new, unique file path for the theme.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GenerateThemeFilePath%2A> to create a unique file path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 테마의 고유한 파일 경로를 만들려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GenerateThemeFilePath%2A>를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity designer from which to retrieve the theme.
Gets the theme for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GetDesignerTheme%2A> to retrieve the theme associated with a specified activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 Activity Designer와 연결된 테마를 검색하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GetDesignerTheme%2A>을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Loads a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
The file path of the theme.
Loads the theme from the specified file path.
A new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> loaded from the filename specified.
The serialization manager to use to load the theme.
trans-unit.target: 테마를 로드하는 데 사용할 serialization 관리자입니다.

trans-unit.source: The file path from which to load the theme.
Loads a new theme from the specified path using a serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: serialization 관리자를 사용하여 지정된 경로에서 새 테마를 로드합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> loaded from the file path specified using the serialization manager specified.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 serialization 관리자를 사용하여 지정된 파일 경로에서 로드된 새 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If your theme requires custom serialization, use this method to load your method using your custom serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 테마에 대해 사용자 지정 serialization이 필요한 경우 이 메서드를 사용하고 사용자 지정 serialization 관리자를 사용하여 메서드를 로드합니다.

trans-unit.source: Loads a theme from the registry.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> loaded from the registry.
`LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry` loads
Gets the file path from the registry.
The file path from the registry to the theme.
The `FilePath` represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.
trans-unit.target: `FilePath`는 테마 설정을 저장하는 파일의 경로를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the theme.
The name of the theme.
Use the name to uniquely identify the theme among other themes.
trans-unit.target: 다른 테마들 중에서 해당 테마를 고유하게 식별하기 위한 이름을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마가 읽기 전용이기 때문에 속성 값을 설정할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마가 읽기 전용인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow theme is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마가 읽기 전용이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
The following example shows how to set and un-set the `ReadOnly` property for the purposes of setting the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 `ReadOnly` 속성을 설정하기 위한 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> 속성 설정 및 해제 방법을 보여줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 Tracking Profile Designer SDK 샘플에 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
Gets the registry key path for the theme.
The registry key path for the theme.
Use the registry key to provide a unique place in the Windows registry to save theme information.
trans-unit.target: Windows 레지스트리에 테마 정보를 저장할 고유한 공간을 제공하려면 레지스트리 키를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The file in which to save the <see langword="WorkflowTheme" />.
Saves a theme to a file.
Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.Save%2A> to persist a theme to a file.
Saves a theme to the registry.

Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.SaveThemeSettingToRegistry%2A> to save the theme to the registry using the key specified by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.RegistryKeyPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.SaveThemeSettingToRegistry%2A>에 의해 지정된 키를 사용하여 레지스트리에 테마를 저장하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.RegistryKeyPath%2A>를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of standard themes.
A list of available themes.
Releases the managed resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
Occurs when a theme changes.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ThemeChanged> occurs when properties of the theme changes, or when a theme is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 테마의 속성을 변경하거나 테마를 로드할 때 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ThemeChanged>가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the theme.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType" /> of the theme.
Possible values are <see langword="Default" />, <see langword="System" />, and <see langword="UserDefined" />.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 값은 <see langword="Default" />, <see langword="System" /> 및 <see langword="UserDefined" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the theme.
The version information for the theme.
Use the version information to indicate successive improvements to a named theme.
trans-unit.target: 명명된 테마의 연속적인 향상을 표시하려면 버전 정보를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 테마가 읽기 전용이기 때문에 속성 값을 설정할 수 없는 경우
